changeSet.author: jds10kg
changeSet.comment: Add taxon_organisation table. Allows taxa to be linked to multiple organisations.

changeSet.author: mst10kg
changeSet.comment: Change sequence generation to remove legacy `hibernate_sequences` table and add default `hibernate_sequence` sequence so that all entities can use sequences. This should improve performance by enabling JDBC batching see https://docs.jboss.org/hibernate/orm/5.3/userguide/html_single/Hibernate_User_Guide.html#identifiers-generators-identity and also makes the database and model simpler. We use custom sql scripts because the `createSequence` and `dropSequence` change types ✨do not work✨.
